name: The World of Pirates
description:
Welcome in this simulation-action game of "The World of Pirates" where you take the role of a pirate battling to take over the sea. With a range of ships sailing towards the peninsula, you must use your fire cannons to take them down before they destroy your own ship. But be careful - these pirates won't go down without a fight and they'll be firing back at you!

To increase your chances of winning, you can collect treasures that are scattered around the water. These treasures will give you an extra boost in HP and help you level up to become a stronger pirate. You can also use different skills such as bullet speed, mobility, and increased damage to help you in your battle.

Can you defeat them and become the king of the pirates? Only the strongest and most skilled pirate can claim victory in this game.

Game Features :
- Open world gameplay with a vast ocean to explore, multiple islands to discover
- Realistic naval combat with physics-based movement
- Special skills ( increasing HP ,critical damage, bullet speed)

Your progress will be count just in time playing, so don't leave the pirates, play play and play!!!
